DOC.brief_summary: To proof therapeutic equivalence daily ( OD ) versus three time daily ( TID ) dose total 3.0 g mesalazine granules patient active ulcerative colitis
DOC.brief_title: OD vs. TID Dosing With Mesalazine Granules Active Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( main ) : Active ulcerative colitis except proctitis , i.e . inflammation minimal 15cm ab ano , confirm endoscopy histology Established new diagnosis Disease activity baseline : Clinical Activity Index ( CAI ) > 4 Endoscopic Index ( EI ) > = 4 Exclusion Criteria ( main ) : Crohn 's disease Toxic megacolon Present past colorectal cancer Symptomatic gastrointestinal disease Serious secondary disease ( ) Baseline stool positive germ cause bowel disease Immunosuppressants within 3 month and/or corticosteroid within 1 month prior baseline Current relapse occur maintenance treatment > 2g/day mesalazine Serum creatinine > = 1.2x upper limit normal ( ULN ) creatinine clearance < 60 ml/min per 1.73 m2 Serum transaminase ( ALT and/or AST ) , and/or alkaline phosphatase > = 2x ULN
